name: Subtitle Editor
description: Subtitle Editor is an editing tool for text subtitles. It supports multiple character encoding and subtitle formats. It's characterized with error checking, merging, splitting, editing based on time line, real-time preview and other functions.

en_US.description: Subtitle Editor is an editing tool for text subtitles. It supports multiple character encoding and subtitle formats. It's characterized with error checking, merging, splitting, editing based on time line, real-time preview and other functions.
en_US.name: Subtitle Editor

zh_CN.description: Subtitle Editor是一款针对文本格式类字幕的编辑工具，支持多种字符编码和字幕格式。它具有错误检查、合并、分割、基于时间轴编辑、实时预览等功能。
zh_CN.name: Subtitle Editor
